name: Meal Planner & Macro Tracker
description: Embrace Healthy Lifestyle.Are you struggling to stick with your diet? Planning to eat healthy, but can't start? I feel you. You're not alone. Counting calories in your head doesn't work in long term.You need a solid plan and a tool to help you succeed.Presenting you Meal Planner & Macro Tracker.Notion system for tracking everything in one place.Set your calories & macros goal, add your favourite meals with counted macros and track what you eat and drink everyday with ease.Whether you wan
